name: docker-scaling-web-api-reverse-proxy-traefik-redis-whoami
description: A short demo on how to use docker-compose to create a Web Service connected to a load balancer and a Redis Database. Be sure to check out my blog post on the full overview - [brianchristner.io](https://www.brianchristner.io/how-to-scale-a-docker-container-with-docker-compose/)

scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m Build && git push
